lyrics.text:
Sīsū ko ho ta’ata’a,
Pea mo ho angatonu
Ko ‘eku teunga pē ia
Pea matamata lelei.

’I he’eku teunga’aki
‘A e teunga pe ko ia,
Pea u fiemālie ai,
‘I he ngaahi maama vela.

He kuo ‘aofia au,
‘Eiki ‘e ho ta’ata’a
Mei he mā, mo e hia,
Pea u ‘ata’atāina.

Pea ‘oku ou tui ni,
Ko hoku ‘Eiki pē koe;
Mo hoku ‘Otua foki,
‘Oku ou malu’ia ai.

Ko ho ta’ata’a tapu,
‘I he nofo’anga ‘ofa;
‘Oku ‘aonga ma’u ai pē,
Ki he kakai angahala.

Pea na’e lingi ia,
‘I he’eku angaia;
Pea ko e hao’anga,
Ki māmami kotoa pē.
